metadata.title: CVE-2023-40968 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in hzeller timg v.1.5.1 and before allows aremote attacker to cause a denial of service via the 0x61200000045caddress.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40968` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

timg - 1.5.2-1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: timg package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-1build2').
